Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays leaving Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays leaving Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Allow extra travel time.
